00049 //
00050 // QueryResponseUnpacker
00051 //
00052 // 23 March 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_QUERYRESPONSEUNPACKER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_QUERYRESPONSEUNPACKER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/NetworkMessageStream.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/InferenceNetwork.hpp"
00060 #include "lemur/Exception.hpp"
00061 
00062 class QueryResponseUnpacker : public MessageStreamHandler {
00063 private:
00064   NetworkMessageStream* _stream;
00065   InferenceNetwork::MAllResults _results;
00066   std::string _exception;
00067   bool _done;
00068 
00069 public:
00070   QueryResponseUnpacker( NetworkMessageStream* stream ) :
00071     _stream(stream),
00072     _done(false)
00073   {
00074   }
00075 
00076   InferenceNetwork::MAllResults& getResults() {
00077     while( !_done && _stream->alive() && !_exception.length() )
00078       _stream->read(*this);
00079 
00080     if( _exception.length() )
00081       LEMUR_THROW( LEMUR_RUNTIME_ERROR, _exception );
00082     
00083     return _results;
00084   }
00085 
00086   void reply( XMLNode* node ) {
00087     assert( false && "Query responses are binary only for now" );
00088   }
00089 
00090   void reply( const std::string& name, const void* buffer, unsigned int length ) {
00091     std::string nodeName;
00092     std::string listName;
00093     
00094     nodeName = name.substr( 0, name.find(':') );
00095     listName = name.substr( name.find(':')+1 );
00096     
00097     ScoredExtentResult aligned;
00098     int count = length / sizeof(ScoredExtentResult);
00099     std::vector<ScoredExtentResult>& resultVector = _results[nodeName][listName];
00100 
00101     for( int i=0; i<count; i++ ) {
00102       // copy for alignment
00103       memcpy( &aligned, (const char*)buffer + i*sizeof(ScoredExtentResult), sizeof(ScoredExtentResult) );
00104 
00105       aligned.begin = ntohl(aligned.begin);
00106       aligned.end = ntohl(aligned.end);
00107       aligned.document = ntohl(aligned.document);
00108       aligned.score = lemur_compat::ntohd(aligned.score);
00109 
00110       resultVector.push_back(aligned);
00111     }
00112   }
00113 
00114   void replyDone() {
00115     _done = true;
00116   }
00117 
00118   void request( XMLNode* node ) {
00119     assert( false && "No requests expected from the query server" );
00120   }
00121 
00122   void error( const std::string& err ) {
00123     _exception = err;
00124   }
00125 
00126 };
00127 
00128 #endif // INDRI_QUERYRESPONSEUNPACKER_HPP
00129
